steps.title: Consent & Safety
steps.subheading: Please confirm a few safety items before we begin.
steps.helper: These help us keep this space ethical and safe. If you are under 18 or currently in crisis, we will share resources and pause the experience.

fields.label: Are you 18 or older?
fields.subheading: This experience is designed for adults.

descriptions.Yes: I am 18+ and ready to proceed

fields.label: Are you currently in crisis?
fields.subheading: If yes, we will show immediate support options.

descriptions.Yes: I need immediate support or feel unsafe
descriptions.No: I am not in crisis right now

fields.label: Consent to proceed
fields.subheading: Confirm that you consent to AI-guided coaching and that this is not a substitute for therapy.

descriptions.Agree: I consent to AI‑guided support (not medical advice)

fields.label: Disclaimer
fields.subheading: You understand content can be direct and you can adjust tone at any time.

descriptions.Agree: I understand tone may be direct and adjustable

steps.title: How Should We Talk to You?
steps.subheading: Choose the style that feels most supportive. You can change this anytime.
steps.helper: These choices shape tone, rawness, and interpretive risk in your guidance.

fields.label: Communication Tone
fields.subheading: What emotional tone feels most comfortable?

descriptions.Gentle: Soft, nurturing approach with extra care and patience
descriptions.Coaching: Motivational and encouraging with actionable guidance
descriptions.Casual: Relaxed, friendly tone like talking to a close friend
descriptions.Spiritual: Meaning-oriented language that honors intuition and beliefs

descriptions.Friend: Supportive peer who listens and shares experiences
descriptions.Mentor: Wise advisor who shares knowledge and perspective
descriptions.Coach: Motivational trainer focused on goals and progress

fields.label: Guidance Strength
fields.subheading: How strong should the push be?

steps.title: Primary Focus Area
steps.subheading: What should we focus on first?
steps.helper: This seeds the next set of adaptive questions.

fields.label: Choose one
fields.subheading: Pick the area that matters most right now.

descriptions.Sleep: Falling asleep, staying asleep, or waking unrefreshed
descriptions.Anxiety: Persistent worry, tension, or physical stress symptoms
descriptions.Trauma-processing: Gently processing past events and reducing triggers
descriptions.Purpose/direction: Clarity on values, direction, and goals
descriptions.Money/behavior: Spending habits, avoidance, and financial stress
descriptions.Addiction/compulsions: Craving loops, urges, and harm‑reduction support

steps.title: Goals & Learning Preferences
steps.subheading: What do you want and how do you like to learn?

fields.label: Engagement
fields.subheading: How active do you want to be?

steps.title: Constraints & Context
steps.subheading: Help us size the work to your day.
steps.helper: This controls action length and the UI we present.

steps.title: Lived Context (Optional)
steps.subheading: Anything that helps us pace and support you.
steps.helper: Select any context that applies to you. These are not diagnoses—just signals to tune pacing, safety, and copy.

fields.label: Context flags (check any that apply)
fields.subheading: Choose anything you live with or manage. This helps us adapt difficulty, tone, and safety—not label you.

descriptions.ASD: On the autism spectrum or self-identified
descriptions.PTSD: History of trauma with ongoing symptoms
descriptions.Depression: Ongoing low mood or depressive episodes
descriptions.Chronic pain/illness: Conditions that affect energy or mobility

fields.label: Schedule note
fields.subheading: Optional: tell us when you have energy or constraints (e.g., mornings only, long shifts Tue/Thu). We’ll size and time suggestions to fit.
fields.placeholder: e.g., Mornings best; Tue/Thu busy; 10 mins after kids' bedtime

steps.title: Current Baselines
steps.subheading: 3 quick checks to anchor your plan.
steps.helper: These anchor toxicity subscales and confidence.

fields.label: Stress
fields.subheading: Drag the slider to reflect your current stress.

fields.label: Sleep quality
fields.subheading: Overall quality of your recent sleep.

fields.label: Rumination frequency
fields.subheading: How often you get stuck looping on thoughts.

descriptions.Self-harm content: Do not include methods or directives
descriptions.Abuse narratives: Avoid detailed recounting of abuse events
descriptions.Addiction content: Skip content about substance use specifics
descriptions.Sexual content: Avoid sexual material in examples or copy

steps.title: Challenges
steps.helper: This weights subscales and guides adaptive questions.

fields.label: Other (optional)
fields.placeholder: Anything else? (Why we ask: captures edge cases for personalization)

steps.title: Final Personalisation
steps.subheading: Anything else that will help tailor your plan?
steps.helper: Examples: ‘short blunt advice’, ‘no fluff’, ‘I want accountability’.

fields.label: Additional context
fields.placeholder: Share any preferences or context (e.g., ‘short blunt advice’, ‘no fluff’, ‘I want accountability’).

fields.label: Allow anonymized data to improve the model?

descriptions.Yes: Help us improve—never stored with your identity
descriptions.No: Do not use my data for improvement

fields.label: I understand I can export/delete my data

descriptions.Yes: I know I can export or delete data anytime
